倡.definition: to initiate; to instigate; to introduce; to lead

倡導.definition: to advocate; to initiate; to propose; to be a proponent of (an idea or school of thought)

倡言.definition: to propose; to put forward (an idea); to initiate

倡議.definition: to suggest; to initiate; proposal; initiative

倡議書.definition: written proposal; document outlining an initiative
